00018 #include <iostream>
00019 #include <fstream>
00020 #include <boost/program_options.hpp>
00021 #include <votca/csg/version.h>
00022 #include "csg_stat_imc.h"
00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 #include <votca/csg/csgapplication.h>
00025 
00026 //using namespace votca::tools;
00027 using namespace std;
00028 using namespace votca::csg;
00029 
00030 class CsgStatApp
00031     : public CsgApplication
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     CsgStatApp() : _write_every(0) {}
00035     
00036     string ProgramName() { return "csg_stat"; }
00037     void HelpText(ostream &out);
00038 
00039     bool DoTrajectory() {return true;}
00040     bool DoMapping() {return true;}
00041     bool DoMappingDefault(void) { return false; }
00042     bool DoThreaded() {return true; }
00043     bool SynchronizeThreads() {return true;}
00044     void Initialize();
00045     bool EvaluateOptions();
00046 
00047     void BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref);
00048     void EndEvaluate();
00049 
00050     CsgApplication::Worker *ForkWorker() {
00051         return _imc.ForkWorker();
00052     }
00053 
00054     void MergeWorker(CsgApplication::Worker *worker) {
00055         _imc.MergeWorker(worker);
00056     }
00057 
00058 public:
00059     Imc _imc;
00060     int _write_every;
00061 };
00062 
00063 void CsgStatApp::HelpText(ostream &out)
00064 {
00065     out << "Calculate all distributions (bonded and non-bonded) specified in options file.\n"
00066             "Optionally calculates update matrix for invere Monte Carlo. This program\n"
00067             "is called inside the inverse scripts. Unlike csg_boltzmann, big systems\n"
00068             "can be treated as well as non-bonded interactions can be evaluated.";
00069 }
00070 
00071 void CsgStatApp::Initialize()
00072 {
00073     CsgApplication::Initialize();
00074     AddProgramOptions("Specific options")
00075             ("options", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "  options file for coarse graining")
00076             ("do-imc", "  write out Inverse Monte Carlo data")
00077             ("write-every", boost::program_options::value<int>(&_write_every), "  write after every block of this length, " \
00078                 "if --blocking   is set, the averages are cleared after every output")
00079             ("do-blocks", "  write output for blocking analysis");
00080 }
00081 
00082 bool CsgStatApp::EvaluateOptions()
00083 {
00084     CsgApplication::EvaluateOptions();
00085     CheckRequired("options");
00086     CheckRequired("trj", "no trajectory file specified");
00087     
00088     _imc.LoadOptions(OptionsMap()["options"].as<string>());
00089 
00090     _imc.WriteEvery(_write_every);
00091     if(OptionsMap().count("do-blocks"))
00092         _imc.DoBlocks(true);
00093     if(OptionsMap().count("do-imc"))
00094     _imc.DoImc(true);
00095 
00096     _imc.Initialize();
00097     return true;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void CsgStatApp::BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref)
00101 {
00102     _imc.BeginEvaluate(top, top_ref);
00103 }
00104 
00105 void CsgStatApp::EndEvaluate()
00106 {
00107     _imc.EndEvaluate();
00108 }
00109 
00110 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00111 {
00112     CsgStatApp app;
00113     return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00114 }
